name: compare_rental_prices
description: Compares rental prices/index between multiple districts, projects, or communities.
whenToUse: User asks to compare rent between two or more locations.
User wants to know which area is more expensive/cheaper for rent.
User asks for a rental comparison chart.

examples.user: Compare rent in Yas Island, Saadiyat and Reem Island
examples.notes: call compare_rental_prices(['Yas Island', 'Saadiyat Island', 'Al Reem Island'], 'district')

examples.user: Which is cheaper for 2BR apartments: Yas or Reem?
examples.notes: call compare_rental_prices(['Yas Island', 'Al Reem Island'], 'district', undefined, undefined, '2 beds')

entities.description: List of names to compare (e.g. ['Yas Island', 'Saadiyat'])

entityType.description: Type of entities being compared. Default to 'district' if ambiguous.
